game.l_dis:
Subway Surfers: Beijing – Run Through the Streets of China

Subway Surfers: Beijing brings the Subway Surfers World Tour to the vibrant streets of Beijing. Run, dodge trains, and collect coins while enjoying culturally inspired visuals and characters.

What is Subway Surfers: Beijing?

This edition of Subway Surfers features a Chinese-themed setting with unique characters like Sun the Acrobat, Panda and Dragon hoverboards, and festive decorations.

How to Play Subway Surfers: Beijing?

  • Swipe Controls: Swipe up to jump, down to roll, and left/right to switch lanes.
  • Collect Coins: Grab coins to unlock new characters and hoverboards.
  • Navigate Obstacles: Dodge trains, barriers, and dynamic hazards in the city.
  • Use Power-Ups: Boost your run with magnets, jetpacks, and other abilities.

Why Play Subway Surfers: Beijing Unblocked?

Enjoy Subway Surfers: Beijing anywhere online, without restrictions, and experience the special themed edition from the comfort of your browser.

Key Features

  • World Tour – Beijing: Explore the iconic streets of Beijing with themed visuals and animations.
  • New Characters: Play as Sun the Acrobat and unlock themed hoverboards like Panda and Dragon.
  • Endless Runner Action: Classic Subway Surfers gameplay with fast-paced, swipe-based control.
  • Power-Ups & Coins: Collect boosts and coins to maximize your score and unlock rewards.
  • Unblocked Online: Play instantly on any network without limitations.

Dash Through Beijing!

Run, swipe, and soar in Subway Surfers: Beijing. Experience a festive, culturally rich version of the endless runner game while collecting coins and unlocking new characters!
